regions.name: Kanto
regions.description: The Kanto region is the first region in the Pokémon series, featured in the original games.

regions.name: Johto
regions.description: The Johto region is known for its traditional Japanese influence and is featured in the second generation of Pokémon games.

regions.name: Hoenn
regions.description: The Hoenn region is known for its varied landscapes, including many islands and bodies of water.
